section.64: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Ibn `Abbas added:The Prophet married Maimuna during the `Umrat-al-Qada' (i.e. the `Umra performed in lieu of the `Umra which the Prophet (ï·º) could not perform because the pagans, prevented him to perform that `Umra
